abstract: Goldman Sachs will share $3.8 billion between the 35,400 people in its employ in the third quarter, a pay pool down significantly from the same time last year, The Financial Times reports.
snippet: Goldman Sachs will share $3.8 billion between the 35,400 people in its employ in the third quarter, a pay pool down significantly from the same time last year, The Financial Times reports.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs will divide $3.8 billion among 35,400 employees in the third quarter, a pay pool reduced significantly from the period a year earlier, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Under Spotlight, Goldman to Cut Compensation
